channel.title: Products on LocalStack
channel.description: Recent content in Products on LocalStack

item.title: LocalStack Desktop
item.description: LocalStack Desktop LocalStack Desktop, a fully-integrated desktop experience for LocalStack. Start using LocalStack - without the fuss LEARN MORE DOWNLOAD Control LocalStack Start and Stop LocalStack instances with the click of a button See the current status of your LocalStack instances Easily access the application via a tray icon Instant insights Interact with your LocalStack instances via the built-in CLI See log information of your LocalStack instances Resource Browser Directly interact with your services via the UI Supports both multi-account and multi-region Unlocks after signing in
